title: How fast are Linux pipes anyway? (2022)
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightblue];edge[arrowhead=vee];start[label="Goal: Optimize
Pipe Throughput
(Inspired by FizzBuzz)", fillcolor=lightgreen];slow_version[label="1. Slow Version
(write/read syscalls)", URL="https://mazzo.li/posts/fast-pipes.html#first-version"];pipe_impl[label="2. Pipe Internals
(Why write/read is slow)", URL="https://mazzo.li/posts/fast-pipes.html#trouble-with-write"];splice_intro[label="3. vmsplice/splice
(Zero-copy)", URL="https://mazzo.li/posts/fast-pipes.html#splicing"];paging[label="4. Linux Paging
(Huge Pages)", URL="https://mazzo.li/posts/fast-pipes.html#paging"];busy_loop[label="5. Busy Looping", URL="https://mazzo.li/posts/fast-pipes.html#busy-loop"];closing[label="6. Closing Thoughts", URL="https://mazzo.li/posts/fast-pipes.html#closing-thoughts"];start->slow_version;slow_version->pipe_impl;pipe_impl->splice_intro;splice_intro->paging;paging->busy_loop;busy_loop->closing;{rank=same;perf[label="Profiling with
`perf`", shape=cylinder, fillcolor=lightyellow];slow_version->perf;pipe_impl->perf;splice_intro->perf;paging->perf;busy_loop->perf;}github[label="Code on GitHub", shape=octagon, URL="https://github.com/bitonic/pipes-speed-test", fillcolor=khaki];start->github[style=dashed];throughput_increase[label="Throughput Increase:
